mapper.select: insert into Bd_BOARD (MEMBER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content}) SELECT @@IDENTITY AS boardNo
select top 1 MEMBER_NAME from Cu_MEMBER as a left outer join Bd_BOARD as b on a.MEMBER_NO = b.MEMBER_NO where a.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

select b.MEMBER_NAME as memberName ,a.BOARD_NO as boardNo ,a.TITLE as title ,a.REG_DATE as bregDate ,a.ISENABLED as isEnabled ,b.MEMBER_NO as memberNo from Bd_BOARD as a inner join Cu_MEMBER as b on a.MEMBER_NO = b.MEMBER_NO
ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC OFFSET (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
select count(*) from Bd_BOARD as a inner join Cu_MEMBER as b on a.MEMBER_NO = b.MEMBER_NO

select MEMBER_NAME as memberName , HIT as hit , a.REG_DATE as regDate , a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate , TITLE as title , CONTENT as content , b.MEMBER_NO as memberNo , a.BOARD_NO as boardNo FROM Bd_BOARD as a inner join Cu_MEMBER as b on a.MEMBER_NO = b.MEMBER_NO where BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Bd_FILE( BOARD_NO, ORIGINFILE_NAME, SAVEDFILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE )VALUES( #{boardNo}, #{originfileName}, #{savedfileName}, #{fileSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Bd_BOARD SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
UPDATE Bd_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
UPDATE Bd_BOARD SET ISENABLED = 'Y', UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGINFILE_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM Bd_FILE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND ISENABLED = 'N' ORDER BY FILE_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE Bd_FILE SET ISENABLED = 'Y' WHERE FILE_NO = #{FILE_NO}
mapper.select: select TOP 4 TITLE as title , REG_DATE as bregDate FROM Bd_BOARD WHERE ISENABLED = 'N' ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
